Class ObjectPool<T>

java.lang.Object
io.netty.util.internal.ObjectPool<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of the pooled object
public abstract class ObjectPool<T> extends Object
Light-weight object pool.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static interface 
    ObjectPool.Handle<T>
    Handle for an pooled Object that will be used to notify the ObjectPool once it can reuse the pooled Object again.
    static interface 
    ObjectPool.ObjectCreator<T>
    Deprecated.
    For removal.

  • Method Details

    • get

      @Deprecated public abstract T get()
      Deprecated.
      For removal. Please use Recycler.get() instead.
      Get a Object from the ObjectPool. The returned Object may be created via ObjectPool.ObjectCreator.newObject(Handle) if no pooled Object is ready to be reused.

    • newPool

      @Deprecated public static <T> ObjectPool<T> newPool(ObjectPool.ObjectCreator<T> creator)
      Deprecated.
      For removal. Please use
      invalid reference 
      Recycler()
      instead.
      Creates a new ObjectPool which will use the given ObjectPool.ObjectCreator to create the Object that should be pooled.
